message.content:
cs.SE, cs.CY, cs.PL, cs.SD, cs.DC. 

This paper discusses the challenges faced by an organization when transitioning to a software platform strategy, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also touches upon issues related to distributed development and management structures, which could be categorized under cybernetics (cs.CY). The use of agile methods and tool support for testing and continuous integration could be classified under programming languages (cs.PL) and software development (cs.SD), respectively. Finally, the paper also discusses the need for further research on reuse recommendation systems, which could be categorized under distributed computing (cs.DC).
